ygData.subject: Re: archery and when did paladins get it??
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw it come about yesterday as well.  Kinda cool, but as you say, it is another skill we have to train now.  Maybe the merchants weren t selling enough bows
ygData.messageBody:
I saw it come about yesterday as well. Kinda cool, but as you say, it is
another skill we have to train now. Maybe the merchants weren't selling
enough bows and arrows...hehe.

Grod

-----Original Message-----
From: Brian Williams [mailto:gungho77@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 10:41 PM
To: EQPaladin
Subject: [eqpaladin] archery and when did paladins get it??


From: "Brian Williams" <gungho77@...>

Tonight, when goign through my skills, i saw archery in there. I petitioned
a GM to ask and he said paladins now get archery. Anyone know when this was
effective? Another weapon skill to train heheheh.

Abrell of Cazic
